select t.uuid, c.concert_name, t.seat_number,date_format(c.concert_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as concert_date, date_format(c.concert_date, '%h:%m') as concert_time, c.concert_place, t.created_at, t.status from ticket_sample t, concert c where t.concert_id = c.id and t.user_id = #{id}

select t.uuid, c.concert_name, t.seat_number,date_format(c.concert_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as concert_date, date_format(c.concert_date, '%h:%m') as concert_time, c.concert_place, t.created_at, t.status from ticket_sample t, concert c where t.concert_id = c.id and t.uuid = #{uuid}
